User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Block unnecessary system files
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /server/
Disallow: /api/private/
Disallow: /cgi-bin/

# Sitemap locations
Sitemap: https://designdynasty.in/sitemap.xml
Sitemap: https://www.designdynasty.in/sitemap.xml

# Force search engines to always use HTTPS
Host: https://designdynasty.in
